ISSUE.TITLE: Docs: Improve description of security-opt no-new-privileges
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: The current description does not include any information about what category of privilege granting the option limits. For reference, [here](https://www.freedesktop.org/software/systemd/man/latest/systemd.exec.html#NoNewPrivileges=) is systemd's documentation for its `NoNewPrivileges` option that also includes a link to the [kernel documentation](https://docs.kernel.org/userspace-api/no_new_privs.html).
